016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.client;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.spi.CertificatesProvider;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers.DnsLookupService;
021import jakarta.inject.Inject;
022import jakarta.ws.rs.client.ClientBuilder;
023import org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient;
024import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
025import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
026import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
027
028@Service(name = "certificates.client")
029@RunLevel(value = 2)
030@ContractsProvided(CertificatesProvider.class)
031public class ClientCertificatesProviderHK2
032        extends ClientCertificatesProvider {
033    @Inject
034    public ClientCertificatesProviderHK2(ClientBuilder clientBuilder,
035                                         Configuration configuration) {
036        super(clientBuilder, configuration);
037    }
038}
